name: Activate & Deactivate Accounts by Profile Date
description: Automatically activate or deactivate Okta users when their profile activation or deactivation date equals the current day.

flows.name: 1A Find users to activate by profile date
flows.description: Scheduled flow that finds staged users whose profile activation date equals today and routes each to the activate helper.

flows.name: 1B Activate account helper
flows.description: Helper flow that activates a user by ID or login and returns the response status.

flows.name: 2A Find users to deactivate by profile date
flows.description: Scheduled flow that finds active users whose profile deactivation date equals today and routes each to the deactivate helper.

flows.name: 2B Deactivate account helper
flows.description: Helper flow that deactivates a user by ID or login and returns the response status.
